name: Apeiron | Peras - Doomscroll Loop 008
description:
"Peras is equated with (numerical) oddness, unity, rest, goodness, and so on; Apeiron is equated with evenness, plurality, motion, badness. The two principles Peras and Apeiron constituted an ultimate dualism..."

Created with a custom VGA audio-video synthesizer.

10 second 1920 x 1080 video loop
